page.title: 17Uses of Selsdon Woods
page.content: Selsdon Woods is a very interesting place.At the weekend we take our dog Huckleberry for a walk and he enjoys it but he can't go off his lead otherwise he will run away into the big open spaces and chase other dogs. In the winter it's fun because if it snows everyone goes up there on their sledges and there are big bumps in the middle of the field that you go over and fall off the sledge.It is also nice when it's sunny because the sun glistens through the trees and the birds sing making Selsdon Woods a peaceful place to visit.
